snippet: The world's greatest and toughest endurance race takes place this weekend, falling between two Formula One races for once, and it will be watched closely by Formula One fans and participants, past and present.
abstract: The world's greatest and toughest endurance race takes place this weekend, falling between two Formula One races for once, and it will be watched closely by Formula One fans and participants, past and present.

headline.main: F1 on Pause for 24 Hours ... of Le Mans
